content:
Here are some notes from the SMART Health Cards/FAST Security & Identity breakout session today: https://bit.ly/FAST-SHC
Edits & comments to the Google Doc are welcome!
A few takeaways...
-Attendees expect that Verifier adoption of SHC would increase if greater certainty of identity could be provided, and there is ongoing demand for vaccination status information
-Discussed examples of how to cross-walk encounter level immunization record (with some or no identity assurance) to a stronger-assurance real world identity & question of whether guidance on these processes would be helpful
-The concepts here are relevant to FHIR more broadly and not just SHC
-There was interest in meeting again; would a topic here or in the notes document linked above be a good starting point to plan next steps?
